reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's passion for physics is contagious! Her lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen is knowledgeable and approachable. His programming assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures can be dry at times, but she's very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez makes calculus fun! He has a great sense of humor and explains concepts thoroughly.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's research experience adds depth to her lectures. She encourages critical thinking in class discussions.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems disorganized and often goes off-topic during lectures. Grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lab demonstrations are amazing! She makes organic chemistry understandable and interesting.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's analysis of classic literature is insightful. His essay prompts encourage creativity.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's lectures are informative, but the workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee relates economic theories to real-world situations. His classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for art is evident in every lecture. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wright's lectures can be biased. He doesn't always encourage diverse viewpoints in discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen's field trips and hands-on projects make learning about the environment exciting and relevant.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Cohen challenges students to think deeply. His Socratic method of teaching is very effective.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rivera's exams are quite difficult, but her lectures are clear and well-structured.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Baker brings real-world marketing experience to the classroom. His group projects are excellent preparation for the industry.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis's enthusiasm for cultural studies is infectious. Her assignments encourage students to explore diverse perspectives.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's lectures are hard to follow. He seems to assume students have more background knowledge than they do.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Wong makes language analysis fascinating. Her interactive exercises help reinforce complex concepts.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.review: Prof. Simmons provides practical insights into the finance world. His case studies are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Public Health
reviews.review: Dr. Fernandez's lectures are informative, but the class could benefit from more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Theater Arts
reviews.review: Prof. Hoffman's directing workshop is outstanding. He provides constructive feedback and encourages creativity.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Dr. Abdullah's global perspective enriches class discussions. Her debates on current events are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Murphy's teaching style is too fast-paced. It's difficult to keep up with the material in class.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Chang's field trips make geology come alive. Her enthusiasm for rocks and minerals is surprisingly contagious!
